text: Chris Brown Squares Off with Migos at BET After - Party Chris Brown & Migos Square Off at BET Awards After - Party Exclusive Details Migos and Chris Brown's tempers just got things jumping at the BET Awards after - party... so much so, cops had to respond. Sources at the party tell us Chris had just finished premiering his new music video with Future at the event... near Microsoft Theater in downtown L. A. We're told the guys from Migos were walking in at the same time, and when they came face - to - face with Chris'crew things got tricky.
